snippet: Chelsea has lodged a formal complaint to the English Football Association accusing a referee of using “inappropriate language” toward midfielder John Obi Mikel.
abstract: Chelsea soccer team lodges formal complaint to English Football Association accusing referee of using 'inappropriate language' toward midfielder John Obi Mikel; other soccer items noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JACK BELL

lead_paragraph: Chelsea has lodged a formal complaint to the English Football Association accusing a referee of using “inappropriate language” toward midfielder John Obi Mikel.

headline.main: Chelsea Accuses Referee of Verbal Abuse
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Accuses Referee of Verbal Abuse
